channel.title: Need some help [637/639]
channel.description:
hi guys,
i've jarred and signed my client and made a webclient.
it works 100% for me, but when other people try to use it, they get like the popup screen that asks to run and when they do it, the screen just goes white, it doesn't go any further, not even if they leave it for few mins. (also when they try to run the .jar file, the screen just goes white)
can someone help me please? i really need this badly
thanks,
startcode
